Hi,

I'm trying to get information on how to use the "solve" function that =

can be used to solve a steady-state problem by combined damped Newton 
ite=
ration and time integration.  I know one can use the different oneD 
module=
s (such as FreeFlame and so on).  But if I want to write my 
own "function"=
 to be solved by a Newton iteration/time integration 
routine, how do I do =
that?
